name: FREQUENCY: Prior to commencing any activity
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Ensure that all employees and subcontractors are using the most current and updated set of complete construction drawings
REFERENCE DOCUMENTS: Drawings and drawing registers
RECORD OF CONFORMITY: This ITP signed off
1.2 - Implementation of all measures and controls
FREQUENCY: Prior to commencing any activity
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: All necessary measures and controls are being implemented, that is: PSP, EMP, TMP, JSEA, SWMS & WP
REFERENCE DOCUMENTS: PSP, EMP, TMP, JSEA, SWMS, WP
RECORD OF CONFORMITY: This ITP signed off
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Concrete used shall have a mininmum strength of 32MPa and be
○ Steel fabric shall be F92 reinforcement
RECORD OF CONFORMITY: This ITP signed off
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: All crused rock used in the works shall be Class 3, 20mm nominal size.
RECORD OF CONFORMITY: Test reports from supplier
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: The line, level and location of all pits & structures must be in accordance with the provided design drawings.
○ The position of all pits are to be confirmed with the superintendent if ambiguity arises from the drawings.
RECORD OF CONFORMITY: Survey Report. This ITP signed off.
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Any trench which may have been excavated to a greater depth than necessary shall be filled into the required level with concrete 1:3:6 mix. Any loose material shall be removed.
○ Trench shall be battered, benched or shored in line with WorkSafe code of practice when required by assessment under 1.5m in depth and is mandatory over 1.5m.
○ No stockpiles within 2m of end of the trench to reduce bearing pressure.
RECORD OF CONFORMITY: This ITP signed off
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Base of the trench shall be inspected prior to placement of bedding.
RECORD OF CONFORMITY: This ITP signed off
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: A 100mm minimum layer of compacted class 3 crushed rock shall be used under base of pit
RECORD OF CONFORMITY: This ITP signed off
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Confirm minimum wall thickness and Mesh Cover as per SD1131. Inspect bedding to confirm is compacted to correct depth and free of as water or debris.
RECORD OF CONFORMITY: This ITP signed off
RESPONSIBILITY: Fulton Hogan Engineer / DPT Superintendent
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: All pits are to be constructed in accordance with Vicroads Standard Drawing SD1131.
○ All pits are to be constructed in accordance with Vicroads standards 701 &705. Pit should also be constructed in accordance with site specific drawings.
RECORD OF CONFORMITY: This ITP signed off
2.7 - Pit base shaped with concrete to match pipe invert
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Construct as shown on Standard Drawing SD1131
RECORD OF CONFORMITY: This ITP signed off
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: All pits shall be fitted with standard Vicroads specificed on the drawings of appropriate class.
RECORD OF CONFORMITY: This ITP signed off
